additional_notes: The document contains multiple redactions marked as (b)(6) and (b)(7)(C), indicating withheld information under FOIA exemptions. The content appears to be email correspondence between The Daily Beast and the Federal Bureau of Prisons regarding Jeffrey Epstein's death.
